def example_function():
    """
    Parameters
    ----------
    arg1 : str
        First part is
        pre-wrapped but
        should not be
        respected.

        Second part is very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very very long.
    """
    pass

def example_function():
    """
    Parameters
    ----------
    arg1 : str
        First part is pre-wrapped but should not be respected.

        Second part is very very very very very very very very very very very
        very very very very very very very very very very very very very very
        very very very very very very very very very long.
    """
    pass
